text: Grief is a reaction when someone or something loses something personal. This is usually when someone loses something living that has died, to which a bond or affection was formed. Reactions to grief can be different depending on the person. They can cry, be mad or even not react because they are in shock. Some people say that grief comes in five parts:Broom, Sarah M. "Milestones: Aug. 30, 2004", TIME website # denial # anger # guilt # depression # acceptance ==References== Category:Emotions
title: Grief
